simpledb.query

Interface UpdateScan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Scan
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SelectScan, TableScan

    public interface UpdateScan
extends Scan
    The interface implemented by all updateable scans.
    Author:
    Edward Sciore
